remarks: Value of join for subsets of Hilbert space in terms of supremum: the join is the supremum of its two arguments.  Based on the definition of join in [Beran] p. 3.  For later convenience we prove a general version that works for any subset of Hilbert space, not just the elements of the lattice ` CH ` .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: sshjval3 $p |- ( ( A C_ ~H /\ B C_ ~H ) -> ( A vH B ) = ( \/H ` { A , B } ) ) $.
